snippet: Craig Claiborne took his job seriously, but weekends at his home were great fun.
abstract: Food writer Craig Claiborne was adept at bringing people together and mixing business and pleasure; he admired the home cook as much as the professional chef and often hosted his own lavish dinner parties.
lead_paragraph: Craig Claiborne took his job seriously, but weekends at his home were great fun.

headline.seo: Craig Claiborne: a Force in the Food Revolution
headline.main: Jacques Pépin: A Force in America’s Food Revolution
headline.print_headline: A Force in America’s Food Revolution
